verbose_text: In short, 30 muL citrated WB was mixed with 10 muL rhodamine substrate (thrombin specific fluorogenic substrate, 1.8 mM) and activated with 20 muL of either a mix of CaCl 2 (50 mM) and HEPES buffer containing 5 mg/mL BSA (BSA5) with / without TF, or a calibrator (alpha 2 -macroglobulin - thrombin complex, in-house prepared, 300 nM thrombin activity).
